input.sentences: a look back in time shows us how main street use to look with big department stores .
an old blacksmith shop was one of the main businesses at the turn of the century .
business was booming in downtown with little shops catering to your every need .
a nice local owned general store was a popular spot .
this is how they used to deliver milk to the local townspeople .
output.sentences: We ran across some photos of our town from the 1890s to the 1950s; the stores look so different from those today.
At the end of Main Street was a machine shop that is nowhere to be seen today.
We get everything today from supermarkets and big box stores and the idea of flour and feed store is alien
Most young people today would not know what was meant by the haberdasher, a store like Wendell Holmes.
The finishing touch was seeing the horse drawn milk wagon in front of the local dairy.
